interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: By Terry Hyaluronic Pressed Hydra-Powder | Transcluscent | Infused with Hyaluronic Acid | Vegan
Review Date: 2022/06/18
Store: By Terry
Average Rating: 4.3
Product Details: {'Brand': 'By Terry', 'Item Form': 'powder', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '3.19 x 3.15 x 0.75 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'Item model number': '3700076457087'}
Review Text: This powder is awesome because of the color it will always match with my foundation. It goes on a little white, but after letting it set for a few minutes it dusts off to be completely clear. I love the compact and think this powder holds up well with setting spray.
Review Title: great matte powder
Rating: 5.0

reference_summary:
UPHUNAL Handmade Short Coffin False Nails Set Long Press on Nails Fake Nails 24Pcs for Any Occasions Reusable Acrylic Matte Artificial Nails with Nail File Gifts for Women and Girls (Cute Pink)
UPHUNAL
{'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'UPHUNAL', 'Coverage': 'Half Well Tips', 'Number of Pieces': '24', 'Shape': 'Ballerina', 'UPC': '735626573330'}
These nails are adorable, not your average designs and pretty charming because they look handmade. I am disappointed this set doesnt come with glue (just the little sticker pads) but I have some on hand so no big deal. Also there are so few of the cute design nails, mostly just the black ones.
Edgy designs cute style
(YOUMIDI) Brush and Cat Brush-Smooth combing brush for short and long hair-Pet shedding combing brush, which can remove loose hair, mats, tangles (Gray)
youmidi
{'Brand': 'Youmidi', 'Color': 'Gray', 'Shape': 'Oblong', 'Product Benefits': 'Smoothing', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '10.31 x 5.04 x 2.28 inches; 3.53 Ounces', 'Item model number': '021', 'UPC': '768647685706'}
We ordered this brush to help train our puppy to enjoy being brushed because the bristles are small and it wont pull on him too much. He enjoys us running it over his coat, but we're working on building up his tolerance to it so we haven't gotten to brush him with it fully. He is a husky mix with a short length coat. The brush is really easy to clean when needed,  just press the button.
great for training puppy

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Style Preference**: Enjoys unique and handmade designs, particularly attracted to edgy and cute aesthetics.
- **Product Types**: Strong interest in false nails, especially sets that offer variety and charm. Recently expanded interest to include cosmetic products, particularly those enhancing makeup longevity and appearance.
- **Material Preference**: Prefers acrylic materials for nails due to durability and appeal; values practical, high-quality materials in grooming and cosmetic products that enhance usability.
- **Design Focus**: Seeks visually striking patterns and finishes, feeling disappointment when selections are limited. Equally values function and design in both pet care and beauty items.
- **Functionality and Usability**: Values reusability and practicality, favoring products that provide multiple uses across categories, including grooming tools and cosmetic items.
- **Price Sensitivity**: Values products based on features and design rather than cost alone, actively seeking the best functionality for the price, reflected in a recent emphasis on high-quality beauty items.
- **Review Behavior**: Provides constructive feedback, emphasizing strengths like effectiveness, ease of use, and user experience for both products and pets. Recently rated a beauty product highly for its performance and compatibility.
- **Overall Rating**: Generally gives positive ratings (around 4.0 to 5.0), demonstrating satisfaction with products that meet aesthetic and functional expectations while ensuring harmony across different product aspects. 

This user prioritizes distinctive, multifunctional items that blend creativity, style, and practicality across various product categories.
